Actions.Name: Download results as Zipped up Xml files
Actions.Description: Downloads a zip file containing the analysis results in Xml format (one Xml file per page)

Actions.Name: Download results as Xlsx
Actions.Description: Downloads the results of the table analysis as an Excel (Xlsx) document with separate worksheets for each table.

Actions.Name: Download results as a Znr file
Actions.Description: Downloads the results in the form of a Znr file which can then be viewed and edited by Pdf Workbench (a Zanran tool designed for this purpose)

Actions.Name: Get Status
Actions.Description: Get the status of the document being uploaded - i.e. whether it is in the queue to be processed, being processed or has finished processing
